participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, always looking for new challenges in life.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year. i am a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and thrill-seeking, loves the adrenaline rush of skateboarding.
participant_2.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.
